llm_decision.raw:
LANGUAGE: Hindi
TRANSCRIPTION: बाई और को एक बुरी तरह से हैं
CONFIDENCE: medium
REASONING: Whisper's transcription "बाई और को एक बुप तरास्ता हैं" is close but has a typo "बुप" instead of "बुरी". MMS-ZeroShot's transcription "bai aur ko ek buk traastaa hai" also has a typo "buk" instead of "बुरी". MMS-1B's transcription "तुम्हारे पास तीन महीने बच्चे हैं" is unrelated to the audio. Omni's transcription is in Urdu, not Hindi. Therefore, I combined the correct words from Whisper and MMS-ZeroShot to get the most accurate transcription.
